name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Cloud Engineer with a robust skill set in **Azure**, **M365**, **Identity**, **Security**, and **Compliance**. Expertise in deploying and managing cloud-native systems while ensuring adherence to compliance standards. Proficient in **PowerShell**, implementing Zero-Trust models, and leveraging tools like **Intune**, **Autopilot**, **Exchange**, and **EDR/XDR** for enhanced security posture. Skilled in managing cloud infrastructure using **IaC** methodologies and designing **Azure Landing Zones** for optimized resource management.

Bringing over 13 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, with advanced knowledge in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience in both frontend and backend application development utilizing cutting-edge frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven ability to build AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, alongside a solid foundation in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
